name: Tekki Shodan
description: The first Tekki kata, performed entirely in horse stance (kiba-dachi) with powerful hip movements. Tekki means 'iron horse' and this kata is known for its strong sideways movements while facing forward. The embusen is a straight line with all techniques performed facing north while moving left and right. This kata emphasizes strong hip action, balance, and the development of powerful techniques from a stable base.

subMoves.hiragana: れい
subMoves.description: From the musubi-dachi position, bow (rei) with the hands placed on the thighs

subMoves.hiragana: よい
subMoves.description: Form Heisoku-dachi and place the palm of the left hand on top of the back of the right hand bringing them in front of the lower part of the abdomen, at a slight distance from the body.

subMoves.hiragana: かお みぎむき
subMoves.description: Keeping the upper body unchanged, look to the right, dropping the hip level and cross gent1y the left foot over the right foot, with all toes aligned together.

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ よこふみこみ
subMoves.description: Execute right side stomp kick while moving into horse stance

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ よこ ちゅうだん はいしゅうけ
subMoves.description: Right side middle level back hand block with right hand open (haishu-uke). Left fist in hikité.

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん まええんぴうち
subMoves.description: On the spot, still in kiba-dachi, hit a left elbow (empi-uchi) in the open right hand. The hips remain in front.

subMoves.hiragana: りょうけん みぎ こしかまえ
subMoves.description: Keeping the stance unchanged, look to the left. At the same time, bring both fists to the right hip, with the left fist on top of the right fist, back of the left fist facing forward, and back of the right fist facing downwards.

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり げだんばらい
subMoves.description: Left lower level sweeping block

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん かぎづき
subMoves.description: On the spot, always in kiba-dachi, make a punch right hook (kagi-zuki) average level. Bring the left fist back into hikeness.

subMoves.hiragana: みぎあしまえこさ
subMoves.description: Keeping the upper body, the direction of the upper body, and the left foot position unchanged, maintain the hips leveled low, and cross gently the right foot over the left foot, with all toes aligned together.

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり よこふみこみ
subMoves.description: Left side stomp kick while moving into horse stance

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん うちうけ
subMoves.description: Right middle level inside forearm block

moves.japaneseName: Migi gedan-barai / Hidari jōdan nagashi-uke / Hidari jōdan ura-zuki

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ げだんばらい
subMoves.description: Right lower level sweeping block

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり じょうだん ながしうけ
subMoves.description: Left upper level sweeping block

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり じょうだん うらづき
subMoves.description: Left upper level close punch, left elbow resting on the back of the right fist

subMoves.hiragana: かお ひだりむき
subMoves.description: Keeping the stance and the upper body position unchanged, look to the left.

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり なみがえし
subMoves.description: Turn the head to the left, make a kick sweep up the left foot (nami-gaeshi) to rest in kiba-dachi

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん もろてたてうけ
subMoves.description: Left middle level augmented vertical block, right fist always under the left elbow

subMoves.hiragana: かお ひだりむき
subMoves.description: Keeping the stance and the upper body position unchanged, look to the right.

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ あし なみがえし
subMoves.description: Keeping the upper body, both hands, the level of the hips, both knees and the left foot position unchanged, use the right knee as a pivot point and lift the right foot up high with a springing motion toward the lower part of the abdomen until the sole of the right foot faces upwards.

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ぜんわん みぎ そくめん ちゅうだんうけ
subMoves.description: Swing back down the right foot and form Kiba-dachi. At the same time, keeping the back of the right fist touching the underside of the left elbow, rotate the upper body cJockwise, turning the left forearm outward, with the back of the fist facing downwards.

subMoves.hiragana: りょうけん みぎ こしかまえ
subMoves.description: Orient the head to the left, bring the 2 fists to the right hip

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん もろてよこづき
subMoves.description: Move the left fist to the left side, just below shoulder height, back of the fist up. Simultaneously, drive the right fist forward, then left, bending the elbow to a right angle so the back of the fist faces up. The right forearm finishes in front of the solar plexus, parallel to the chest, about two fists away, with the right fist level with the left side and slightly below the right elbow. Both fists move together.

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり よこ ちゅうだん はいしゅうけ
subMoves.description: Arm slowly and power the left hand under the right armpit and block with the left hand open (haishu-uke) middle level on the left. Right fist in hikité.

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん まええんぴうち
subMoves.description: On the spot, always in kiba-dachi, hit a right elbow (empi-uchi) in the open left hand. The hips remain in front.

subMoves.hiragana: りょうけん ひだり こしかまえ
subMoves.description: Keeping the stance unchanged, look to the right. At the same time, bring both fists to the left hip, with the right fist on top of the left fist, back of the right fist facing forward, and back of the left fist facing downwards.

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ げだんばらい
subMoves.description: Right lower level sweeping block

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん かぎづき
subMoves.description: On the spot, always in kiba-dachi, make a left punch in hook (kagi-zuki) average level. Bring back the right fist in hikeness.

subMoves.hiragana: ひだりあしまえこさ
subMoves.description: Keeping the upper body, the direction of the upper body, and the right foot position unchanged, maintain the hips leveled low, and cross gently the left foot over the right foot, with all toes aligned together.

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ よこふみこみ
subMoves.description: Put the left heel on the ground and then lift your right knee high and hit a crushing kick (fumikomi) right to get into the kiba-dachi position

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん うちうけ
subMoves.description: Left middle level inside forearm block from the inside out, middle level on the left. The hips and the look are from the front.

moves.japaneseName: Hidari gedan-barai / Migi jōdan nagashi-uke / Migi jōdan ura-zuki

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり げだんばらい
subMoves.description: Left lower level sweeping block

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ じょうだん ながしうけ
subMoves.description: Right upper level sweeping block

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ じょうだん うらづき
subMoves.description: Right upper level close punch, right elbow resting on the back of the left fist

subMoves.hiragana: かお みぎむき
subMoves.description: Keeping the stance and the upper body position unchanged, look to the right.

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ なみがえし
subMoves.description: Turn the head to the right, kick up and sweep up the right foot (nami-gaeshi) to rest in kiba-dachi

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん もろてたてうけ
subMoves.description: Right middle level augmented vertical block, left fist always under the right elbow

subMoves.hiragana: かお ひだりむき
subMoves.description: Keeping the stance and the upper body position unchanged, look to the right.

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり なみがえし
subMoves.description: Turn the head to the left, make a kick sweep up the left foot (nami-gaeshi) to rest in kiba-dachi

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん もろてそとうけ
subMoves.description: Right middle level augmented outside block from the outside to the inside middle level, left fist always under the right elbow

subMoves.hiragana: りょうけん ひだり こしかまえ
subMoves.description: Orient the head to the right, bring the 2 fists to the left hip

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん もろてよこづき
subMoves.description: Orient the head to the right, bring the 2 fists in hikité, right fist vertical on the left fist, to the left hip, then perform on the spot a double attack middle-level fist, right arm extended (yoko-zuki) and left arm folded (kagi-zuki)

subMoves.hiragana: よい
subMoves.description: As the left foot stays in place, the right foot moves back alongside the left foot, returning to YOI position. Place the palm of the left hand on top of the back of the right hand bringing them in front of the lower part of the abdomen, at a slight distance from the body.

subMoves.hiragana: れい
subMoves.description: From the musubi-dachi position, bow (rei) with the hands placed on the thighs
